Account Manager for the Austin Branch of Randstad Technologies, formerly known as Sapphire Technologies.

As a National Technical Recruiter with Sapphire Technologies I have the ability to work with the 40+ offices nationally. As a recruiter I focus the majority of my time on our premier strategic accounts, Charles Schwab, United Health Group, Cigna, Bank of America, and Boston Scientific.

recommendations: Jeffrey Pitcher
Sr. Project Manager at Columbia Memorial Hospital
January 27, 2010, Jeffrey worked with Chris in different groups

Chris reached out to me for a Supervisory Data Center consultant position with Bank of America (BOA) in Menands, NY. Chris did his homework on this as it turned out to be a great fit. Five months later I was hired full-time as the Site Data Center Manager at BOA in Kingston, NY. Chris worked with my management team and me at BOA to "close the deal" resulting in my conversion to full-time. I cannot thank Chris enough for all he did for me during this process. I would highly recommend Chris to any company looking for vetted candidates as well as active job seekers looking for a position suited to their experience and skills.

Rodger Cutler Ed.M
Instructional Designer at Lam Research
December 7, 2009, Rodger worked with Chris but at different companies

Chris Farrington is one of the best technical recruiters I have ever worked with. Based on his expert analysis of my resume, he was able to match me with an excellent contract position at Intel in Hillsboro Oregon. Because of his thorough analysis of both the Intel position and my skill set, I was offered the contract after just two phone interviews with the Intel hiring manger! Chris has been my contract manager for over nine months now. During this time if I had any issues, he has been quick to respond and makes sure the situation was taken care of. He also spontaneously checks with me just to make sure things are going OK. I recommended two of my colleagues to Chris and he was able to find contracts for them as well. In this tight labor market, it is good to have someone on your side like Chris!
